title: Daniel Kaplan：任天堂CEO岩田聪提到Minecraft
author: a66344512
txt_content:
本帖最后由 a20001017 于 2015-2-25 21:37 编辑 
Daniel Kaplan：Cool to have minecraft mentioned by Iwata. But they are the real pros, releasing awesome games for 40 years 
Daniel Kaplan：酷！岩田聪提到Minecraft。他們是真正的游戏专业人士，发布了40年了不起的游戏。



文章连接:任天堂CEO岩田聪说的话http://www.gameranx.com/updates/id/26775/article/minecraft-is-a-game-nintendo-should-learn-from-says-ceo-iwata/。文章的标题是：任天堂应该向Minecraft学习
